articles.description: Andros Townsend says he broke down in tears after a free transfer move to Burnley collapsed over the summer.
articles.title: Townsend 'in tears' after Burnley move collapsed

articles.description: Following the publication of the ECB's response to the ICEC report, former England international and broadcaster Ebony Rainford-Brent says cricket can become the most inclusive sport in the country.
articles.title: 'Cricket can become the most inclusive sport'
Stephen Curry: The ‘little guy with skinny arms’ who changed the sport of giants

articles.description: Michal Helik hits a late equaliser to earns Darren Moore's Huddersfield a draw at Coventry in his first game as Terriers boss.
articles.title: Moore's Huddersfield snatch late draw at Coventry

articles.description: Dame Laura Davies says Europe's defence of the Solheim Cup was one of the most exciting she has seen, but Iain Carter writes that the Finca Cortesin course was not fit for purpose.
articles.title: 'Ciganda delivered for Europe at course not fit for purpose'

articles.description: Football pundit Jermaine Jenas has apologised for criticising referee Rob Jones saying he "got it wrong".
articles.title: Jenas apologises for criticising referee

articles.description: Despite Australia facing a first-ever group stage elimination at the Rugby World Cup, sacking coach Eddie Jones is "the worst thing" the Wallabies can do according to former captain Stirling Mortlock.
articles.title: 'Sacking Jones is worst thing Australia can do'

articles.description: Swift attended the game on invitation of Chiefs player Travis Kelce and watched it seated next to his mother.
articles.title: Taylor Swift attends Kansas City Chiefs game

articles.description: Fly-half Gareth Anscombe outlines how important the injured Dan Biggar is to Wales' World Cup campaign.
articles.title: Injured Biggar still vital for Wales - Anscombe

articles.description: Watch 2 Good 2 Bad from Match of the Day 2, featuring a bad miss and stunning goal by Liverpool's Darwin Nunez, goalkeeper celebrations and a referee fumble.
articles.title: Nunez stunners, goalkeeper celebrations and a referee fumble
